tool_description: Checks if market for exchange is open in trading hours now or at specific date
name: Is Stock Market Exchange Open
title: Is Stock Market Exchange Open

api_list.name: Is Market Open Now
api_list.description:
**Check if a given exchange is open now or for specific date AND time.**

The date parameter is optional. If no datetime is given as date, "now" will be used to check current time against exchange trading hours. All date and times are UTC.

api_list.name: Is Market Open Day
api_list.description: Check if a given exchange will be open at a given day. Or today is used of no day is given.
